TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003390_QUINTUS(-威厳のある老将校-)事情は理解した。
ならば、話をさせてもらうとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003400_JULLUS<tab>Yes sir!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003400_JULLUS<tab>ハッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003410_JULLUS<tab>I present to you our commander...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003410_JULLUS<tab>こちらが、この拠点を統監しているお方……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003420_JULLUS<tab>...Lord Quintus van Cinna, legatus of the Ist Legion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003420_JULLUS我ら第I軍団が軍団長、
クイントゥス・ヴァン・キンナ様だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003430_ALPHINAUD<tab>The Ist? I had no idea you had survived!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003430_ALPHINAUD第I軍団の……！？
ご無事でいらっしゃったのですか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003440_QUINTUS<tab>We lost our Emperor, our city, more than half our troops. For my wounds, I may never take the field again. But we survived, aye.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003440_QUINTUS主を失い、都を失い、兵の大半を失った。
この身ももはや、一騎当千の働きを奉上することはできぬ。
無事とはほど遠いわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003450_QUINTUS<tab>In a manner much to your liking, I daresay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003450_QUINTUS<tab>もっとも、そちらにとっては好都合であろうがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003460_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have no intention of adding to your misfortunes. Nor do we bear you any ill will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003460_ALPHINAUDご気分を害してしまったのなら、お詫び申し上げます。
ですが、私たちに敵意はありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003470_QUINTUS<tab>Spare me. Though you children may speak in earnest, overtures of peace ever ring hollow in my ears. So long as man stands to profit from his neighbor's suffering, war is inevitable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003470_QUINTUS……若いな。
敵意などなくとも、利害が生じるかぎり、人は殺し合えよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003480_QUINTUS<tab>Driven from our ancestral homeland into this blasted waste. Yet still you yearned to rob us of our paltry scraps.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003480_QUINTUS我らガレアンは、豊かに実る故郷を追われた。
この極北においてもなお、
他民族の侵攻に耐えねばならなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003490_QUINTUS<tab>'Twas only with magitek that you learned to keep your distance. Though we knew it was only a matter of time before you regrouped and returned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003490_QUINTUS魔導兵器は革新的なものであったが、あれもまた、
守勢に留まっていれば奪われていたことだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003500_QUINTUS<tab>Conquest and empire were our only defenses. Emperors Solus and Varis understood this, and through their campaigns saw us grow and prosper. Much blood has been spilled in Garlemald's name, aye, but if it is a choice between yours and mine, then it is hardly a choice at all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003500_QUINTUSゆえにソル帝もヴァリス帝も、版図の拡大を掲げ、
より強い帝国を目指したのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>I do not deny that a great many conflicts throughout history were driven by the desire─or necessity─to gain by another's loss. That is not why we are here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003510_ALPHINAUD……おっしゃることは、ごもっともです。
それでも私は、人を動かすのは利害のみではないと、
若輩ながらに見て参りました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nor have we come to petition your aid in the war with the Telophoroi, grave though that threat may be. Our purpose is simply this:
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003520_ALPHINAUD今回の件にしても、
テロフォロイの脅威を前に力を合わせたい、
という打算がないわけではありませんが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003530_ALPHINAUD<tab>We wish to help you. Let us help you. If there is aught that can be done to ease your plight, we would be glad to do it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003530_ALPHINAUD何よりも。
あなた方が必要としているのならば、協力したいと思った。
それでこちらへ伺ったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003540_QUINTUS<tab>Perhaps you would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003540_QUINTUS<tab>お前の言葉を疑いはせぬ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003550_QUINTUS<tab>But regardless of the ideals you espouse, your leaders would not send an army into Garlemald if they did not stand to benefit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003550_QUINTUSだが、前線の兵がどれだけ義勇に駆られようが、
国家は善意などでは動かない。
そこに益なくば、国を為す民を護れぬからだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003560_QUINTUS<tab>If we accept their aid, they will expect their efforts to be rewarded once the Telophoroi are no longer a threat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003560_QUINTUS仮に派遣団からの支援を受ければ、
眼前の脅威が去ったあとに、必ず対価を要求されるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003570_QUINTUS<tab>And after compensation and concessions, the great Empire would be brought to heel. Her enemies rejoice at her downfall. Our third eye a mark of shame.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003570_QUINTUSガレマール帝国は、永劫、諸外国に頭を押さえつけられ……
額の「第三の眼」は、飼い犬の象徴との誹りを受けよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003580_ALISAIE<tab>We won't stand idly by and let your people be humiliated─and we're not alone in that. We only want to make a difference─to make this world of ours better. Surely you can understand that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003580_ALISAIEそんなことをしようとしたら、私は止める。
ほかにも異を唱える人はいるはずよ。
善い世界を望む心も、決して絶やせないものだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003590_ALISAIE<tab>What I'm trying to say is...there are so, so many people who just don't care about making you suffer. And maybe that's almost insulting after all the suffering you feel the world has subjected your people to, but...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003590_ALISAIE……って言えるのは、
私が実際にそういう人たちと出会ってきたからなんでしょうね。
あなたには戯言にしか聞こえないかもしれないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003600_ALISAIE<tab>Believe it or not, that's the truth. And now we're here, and all we're asking is for you to tell us what you want. What you hope for.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003600_ALISAIEだから、信じてとは言わない。
まずは「あなたが望むかどうか」だけ、聞かせてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003610_ALPHINAUD<tab>So much blood has been shed. So much lost. All because of this endless war. Who wouldn't want to end it?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003610_ALPHINAUD不幸を誰かに押しつけるのではなく、
皆で乗り越えようとする世界を、模索していけないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003620_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can we not work together, to face our problems as one?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003620_ALPHINAUDガレアンの人々と我々で、
そんな未来への１歩を踏み出せはしないでしょうか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003630_QUINTUS<tab>Answer me this, young peacemakers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003630_QUINTUS<tab>……では逆に問おう、若き異国の民よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003640_QUINTUS<tab>If a world without conflict is your desire, why reject the unity and prosperity of Garlemald?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003640_QUINTUS調和を望むのであれば、なぜ、
ガレマールによる世界統治を受け入れなかった？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003650_QUINTUS<tab>Is it because we do not share your faith?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003650_QUINTUS<tab>我らがお前たちの神を信じなかったからか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003660_QUINTUS<tab>That we do not share your heritage?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003660_QUINTUS<tab>我らとお前たちの形が違うからか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003670_QUINTUS<tab>That our ideals and virtues differ? That we cherish and hold in the highest that which you do not?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003670_QUINTUSお前たちと異なる理想を、法を掲げ、
異なるものを愛するからか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003680_QUINTUS<tab>Disparity is the root of discord, and peace built on compromise is flawed and fleeting. Happiness for one and all is a dream, and the reality is that to the victor go the spoils.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003680_QUINTUSそうだとも、不和は争いを生み、調和の先に自由はない。
誰もを幸福にできる道などないのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003690_QUINTUS<tab>That is why we Garleans will never submit nor surrender. For freedom and for pride, we will remain true to ourselves until the bitter end. That is my hope.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003690_QUINTUSなれば我らガレアンは、最後まで自由と誇りのために争おう。
私の望みは、それだけだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003700_QUINTUS<tab>It seems there is nothing more to say on the matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003700_QUINTUS<tab>話はもうよいな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003710_QUINTUS<tab>You will remain here while I decide what is to be done with you. Do not be alarmed. No harm will come to you─if you cooperate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003710_QUINTUS無暗に危害を加えたりはせぬ。
ただ、我々の為すべきことが決まるまで、
しばし身柄を預からせてもらおう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003720_ALPHINAUD<tab>We will not resist. However, as your “guests,” I ask that we be allowed to speak with the other members of your group.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003720_ALPHINAUD抵抗はしません。
しかし、「滞在」する間、
ここにいる人々と話をさせていただきたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003730_QUINTUS<tab>As you wish. I had no intention of locking you up, as by dawn you would be frozen stiff, and you are no good to me dead. You are free to move about the encampment. But there is one condition.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003730_QUINTUS……よかろう。
どのみちこの寒さでは、閉じ込めたが最後、翌朝には凍死体だ。
それでは何の価値もない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003740_QUINTUS<tab>Collar them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003740_QUINTUS<tab>この者たちに「首輪」を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003750_ALPHINAUD<tab>What are these...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003750_ALPHINAUD<tab>っ……これは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003760_QUINTUS<tab>Incentive. You will be watched at all times. Stray too far or act suspiciously and we will administer a rather painful shock.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003760_QUINTUSお前たちには監視をつける。
我々の意に沿わぬ行動をとった場合、
相応の苦痛を味わうことになるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003770_QUINTUS<tab>Stop. Keep away from that one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003770_QUINTUS<tab>待て、それには近寄るな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003780_QUINTUS<tab>The champion of Eorzea is not so easily cowed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003780_QUINTUS<tab>……くだんの「エオルゼアの英雄」だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003790_QUINTUS<tab>Even if <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> allowed <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> to be collared, the shock would be no more than an itch. No─if <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> refuses to obey, we will activate the twins' restraints instead.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003790_QUINTUSお前たちでは、それ自身は封じられまい。
妙な動きをするようであれば……双子の装置を作動させろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003800_ALPHINAUD<tab>You needn't worry about us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003800_ALPHINAUD<tab>私たちなら大丈夫だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003810_ALISAIE<tab>We'll forget we're even wearing them soon enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003810_ALISAIE<tab>こんなの忘れちゃうくらい、みんなと楽しく話しましょ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003820_QUINTUS<tab>Even now, you still... Why go to such lengths? What is it all for?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003820_QUINTUSなお言うか……。
何がお前たちをそこまで駆り立てる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Because even the most bitter adversary may one day see reason.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>戦い合う者にも和解はあると、教えられたからだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>On the coldest, blackest of nights...meager though it may be, we must share the warmth of our fire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>冷え込むときこそ、火をわけあうべきだからだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003830_QUINTUS<tab>You are a curious one. A far cry from the merciless barbarian others paint you to be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003830_QUINTUS……わからぬな。
名だたる軍団を壊滅せしめた悪鬼でさえ、
かような夢見事を吐くか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003840_QUINTUS<tab>You will be their warden. Take them away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003840_QUINTUS<tab>連れていけ、お前が監視役だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003850_JULLUS<tab>Yes sir!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003850_JULLUS<tab>ハッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003860_THANCRED<tab>Finally escaped the watchful gaze of your keepers, have we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003860_THANCREDやっと監視役が離れたか。
……大丈夫か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003870_THANCRED<tab>Don't react. You'll only draw attention to yourself. Just carry on as you are and listen.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003870_THANCREDおっと、姿は探さなくていい。
そのまま知らぬ顔で聞いてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003880_THANCRED<tab>After you left with the Garlean lad, Lucia bade a few of us scouts follow you at a discreet distance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003880_THANCREDお前たちが帝国兵とキャンプ・ブロークングラスを出たあと、
ルキアから偵察隊に連絡があってな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003890_THANCRED<tab>We observed you being led into the station, but decided against venturing inside.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003890_THANCRED俺たちはすぐに追跡を開始。
お前たちが、テルティウム駅に入ったのを確認している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003900_THANCRED<tab>When you emerged some time later, and we saw that the twins were sporting magitek collars, it was clear what had taken place.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003900_THANCREDその後、出てきたアルフィノとアリゼーに、
魔導仕掛けの装置がつけられていることも確認。
……おおよそ状況は察した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003910_THANCRED<tab>Now, as quietly as you can, tell me everything.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003910_THANCREDその上で、いくつか聞かせてくれ。
駅にいる連中は何者だ？
何を目的にしている？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003920_THANCRED<tab>The legatus himself, eh? Now there's a surprise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003920_THANCRED<tab>なるほど、第I軍団長ときたか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003930_THANCRED<tab>This is also the first I've heard of a plan to join forces with the Xth and storm the Tower of Babil.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003930_THANCRED目的は、第X軍団の連れてくる増援と合流し、
旧魔導城……「バブイルの塔」を、自力で制圧することだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003940_THANCRED<tab>An interesting development...and perhaps the opportunity we've been waiting for.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003940_THANCRED……諸々了解した。
だとしたら、打つ手がないでもない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003950_THANCRED<tab>Our comrades back at the camp also received some rather promising news, but it's still too early to get our hopes up.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003950_THANCRED今しがた、派遣団の方に、ある報告が入ってな。
それを交渉材料にできる可能性が高いだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003960_THANCRED<tab>For now, keeping yourselves out of harm's way comes before all else. Whatever demands the Garleans make, indulge them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003960_THANCREDひとまずお前は、お前自身と、
アルフィノたちの命を護ることを最優先にしてくれ。
相手の要求は、基本的に呑んでくれていい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003970_THANCRED<tab>With luck, this will all be over soon. Until then.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003970_THANCRED頼んだぞ。
それじゃ、またあとで……だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003980_JULLUS<tab>They had not gone far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003980_JULLUS<tab>待たせたな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003990_ALISAIE<tab>We searched high and low, but no luck, I'm afraid. I might've guessed you'd be the only one to find anything.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003990_ALISAIEあちこち探してみたんだけど、収穫なしよ。
悔しいけど、あなたが見つけた分でおしまいね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004000_JULLUS<tab>I wasn't expecting much to begin with. Eventually, there will be nothing left out here for us to safely salvage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004000_JULLUSさほど期待してたわけじゃないが、
いよいよ厳しいか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004010_JULLUS<tab>For now, this will have to suffice. We should return to the station.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004010_JULLUSともかく、今回の捜索はここまでだ。
駅へ戻るぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004020_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Ah, there you are. Heard you'd gone hunting for ceruleum above ground.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004020_COLLEAGUESOLDIERああ、よく戻ったな。
聞いたぞ、青燐水を探させてたんだってな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004030_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Brought back a king's ransom?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004030_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>……で、収穫はどうだった？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004040_JULLUS<tab>Hardly. But thanks to these three, we have enough to last a little while longer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004040_JULLUS少しはな。
こいつらが、よく働いてくれたから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004050_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Well, well. It's not at all what I was expecting, these ones. For savages, they seem positively docile.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004050_COLLEAGUESOLDIERふぅん……。
ヤバい連中だって話だったけど、案外普通なんだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004060_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Ah, it's a poor attempt at humor. In all honesty, I'm grateful for your efforts. But even with another night of warmth, there are those among us who may not live to see the morrow...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004060_COLLEAGUESOLDIERでも、よかったよ。
少しでもあたたかくできそうで。
正直、今晩を越えられるかどうか……って奴もいるからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004070_QUINTUS<tab>I trust your expedition was fruitful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004070_QUINTUS<tab>(-？？？？-)青燐水が見つかったのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004080_JULLUS<tab>Lord Quintus!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004080_JULLUS<tab>クイントゥス様！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004090_QUINTUS<tab>Use what you procured to refuel the armor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004090_QUINTUS<tab>ならば、魔導兵器の燃料に回しておけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004100_JULLUS<tab>But sir, what about the heaters for the camp?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004100_JULLUS<tab>で、ですが、これは拠点をあたためるために……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004110_QUINTUS<tab>The time for action is upon us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004110_QUINTUS<tab>次の作戦が決まった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004120_QUINTUS<tab>My men and I have matters to discuss. In the meantime, you are to wait here. Do not forget─you are being watched.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004120_QUINTUSしばしこの者らと話をする。
だが、いたるところに我らの目があることを忘れるな。
その場で大人しく待機せよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004130_ALISAIE<tab>“The time for action”... What did he mean by that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004130_ALISAIE<tab>作戦って、何でしょうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004140_ALPHINAUD<tab>I can only speculate. Clearly something requiring their magitek, given what we just heard. Whether they plan to utilize it now or after they join with the Xth is another question...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004140_ALPHINAUD……わからない。
魔導兵器にしても、今使うつもりなのか、
第X軍団と合流したあとの備えなのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Will they ever escape this cold? Return to and reclaim the idyllic spaces of which Jullus spoke...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004150_ALPHINAUDどうしたら彼らを、あたたかい場所へと帰せるのだろう。
ユルスが語った冬の街並みや、夏の草原のような場所に……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004160_ALISAIE<tab>Finished your war council?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004160_ALISAIE<tab>話は終わったの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004170_JULLUS<tab>Alphinaud and Alisaie are to stay here...as our prisoners. They will be released once your comrades have relinquished their supplies and withdrawn from Garlean soil.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004170_JULLUSアルフィノとアリゼーを人質として、
派遣団に、物資の譲渡と撤退を促すことが決まった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004180_JULLUS<tab>Until our terms are met, they will be detained at a separate location.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004180_JULLUS<tab>取引が済むまで、ふたりには別の場所に移動してもらう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004190_ALISAIE<tab>After everything we've said and done, this is how you treat us!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004190_ALISAIE<tab>ああもう、どうしてそうなっちゃうわけ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our allies have but limited supplies. They may stave off cold and starvation for a short while, but what then!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004200_ALPHINAUD派遣団の物資にも限りがある。
ひとときそれで凌げても、いつかは君たちが……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004210_THANCRED<tab>For now, keeping yourselves out of harm's way comes before all else. Whatever demands the Garleans make, indulge them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004210_THANCREDアルフィノたちの命を護ることを最優先にしてくれ
相手の要求は 基本的に呑んでくれていい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Do as he says.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>今は素直に従おう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Everything will be all right. Have faith.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分とみんなを信じて待て

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004220_JULLUS<tab>Get them out of here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004220_JULLUS<tab>……連れていけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004230_JULLUS<tab>This is my home. <var 1A 02 /var>Our<var 1A 01 /var> home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004230_JULLUS<tab>……家だったんだ、うちの家族の。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004240_JULLUS<tab>Least it was until that night. I was with Lord Quintus when the capital fell, and thus spared. My family, who did not own a radio, were less fortunate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004240_JULLUS帝都が崩壊したあの夜、
俺はクイントゥス様と同じ場所にいて助かった。
けど、うちにはあのラジオはなかったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004250_JULLUS<tab>When dawn came, I made my way here. My parents...my little brother and sister...they were still inside...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004250_JULLUS朝になって、どうにかここに駆けつけた。
研究職の父も、母も、妹と弟もまだいて……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004260_JULLUS<tab>But they weren't themselves, and they...they tried to... And I had to...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004260_JULLUSだけど、もう、言葉は届かなくなってた。
話しかけたら襲われて……それで……俺は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004270_JULLUS<tab>I'd promised to take them away from the capital that very morning. To somewhere safe, to hide until the fighting stopped.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004270_JULLUS本当だったらその朝に、みんなは帝都を出るはずだったんだ。
内戦が収まるまで、安全な場所に避難してもらう約束だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004280_JULLUS<tab>I promised...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004280_JULLUS<tab>なのに…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004290_JULLUS<tab>The Garlean flag bears a chain. The bonds between our countrymen.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004290_JULLUS……ガレマールの旗には、
民族の団結を示す鎖が描かれてる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004300_JULLUS<tab>A red link at its center─the blood of the fallen. Our loved ones who lived and died for Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004300_JULLUS血色の鎖は、犠牲になった同胞たち。
彼らも含めて、ガレマールって国なんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004310_JULLUS<tab>But if she, too, fell, who would be left to remember them and their sacrifice? What enduring proof would there be that they were ever here?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004310_JULLUSでも……じゃあ、この国がなくなったら、
死んだ同胞たちが生きてたって証は、どこに残る？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004320_JULLUS<tab>If we had turned to your gods, would they have saved us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004320_JULLUS<tab>お前たちみたいに神に祈れたら、答えを得られてたのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004330_JULLUS<tab>I'm sorry. Forget I spoke.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004330_JULLUS<tab>……悪い、話がそれた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004340_JULLUS<tab>We should go.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004340_JULLUS寄り道はもう十分だ。
派遣団と交渉しにいくぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004350_ALISAIE<tab>It's no use.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004350_ALISAIE……やっぱりダメね。
こっちからじゃ開きそうもないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Believe me, I do not enjoy being here any more than you. But he wanted us to play along, so that is what we will do.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004360_ALPHINAUDもどかしいかもしれないが……
彼の言葉を信じて、今はじっと待つとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004370_ALPHINAUD<tab>Believe me, I do not enjoy being here any more than you. But she wanted us to play along, so that is what we will do.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004370_ALPHINAUDもどかしいかもしれないが……
彼女の言葉を信じて、今はじっと待つとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004380_ALISAIE<tab>...It's so cold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004380_ALISAIE<tab>…………寒い。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Painfully so... Unbearably.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004390_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ、本当に……痛いくらいだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004400_ALISAIE<tab>I've been thinking about what Quintus said. About why no one would accept Garlean rule.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004400_ALISAIE……クイントゥスさんに聞かれたことを考えてたのよ。
どうして帝国の統治を受け入れなかったんだろうって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004410_ALISAIE<tab>Irreconcilable differences. When coexistence isn't an option, only conquest remains.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004410_ALISAIE彼は自分たちと私たちが違うからかって言ってたけど……
それを誰より恐れてたのは、
ガレアンの人たちだったんじゃないかと思うの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004420_ALISAIE<tab>Varis at Ghimlyt said much the same. Only by uniting the world beneath a single standard would we rid ourselves of the Ascians.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004420_ALISAIEギムリトの会談で、ヴァリス帝は、
すべての人を帝国民にすることで脅威と戦うって宣言したわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004430_ALISAIE<tab>United...as one people. One race, cleansed of “imperfections.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004430_ALISAIE違いをなくして、無理やりにでも同じものにしないと、
手を組むことはできないって感じてたのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004440_ALISAIE<tab>A cold and unforgiving vision. And when we fail to live up to their standards...what place is there for us in their world?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004440_ALISAIE……強くて、寂しい理想だった。
彼の敷こうとする世界に、
帝国民になれない他者は存在し得なかったのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004450_ALISAIE<tab>But the truly sad, truly <var 1A 02 /var>frustrating<var 1A 01 /var> thing is how damnably similar it all is to the lofty ideals of Father and the Forum.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004450_ALISAIEでね……お父様に感じた怒りも、
そういう拒絶に対する憤りだったんじゃないかって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004460_ALISAIE<tab>Nonintervention─always nonintervention. Protect our knowledge and our people and to hells with the rest of you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004460_ALISAIE争いを避けるのが正しいことだとしても、
その方法が、周りとの繋がりを断つことだなんて。
全然納得できないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004470_ALISAIE<tab>And yet...I can see how it happened. Varis and Father looked to their elders for guidance and took their virtues as their own. For this world was of their making─in who else could they place their trust?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004470_ALISAIEだって私たち、
ヴァリス帝もお父様も見限った人たちから、
こんなに学んで、励まされてきたのよ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004480_ALISAIE<tab>All of us lost in a sea of chaos, searching desperately for purpose and meaning...but it shouldn't just be an extension of another's. It has to be ours. It has to be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004480_ALISAIEそりゃ、考えがバラバラでぶつかることもあったけど……
それもひっくるめて、かけがえのないものだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004490_ALISAIE<tab>We all have a stake in this world. No one should be silenced...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004490_ALISAIE<tab>否定なんてしたくないし、させたくない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004500_ALPHINAUD<tab>I won't deny that we lack the experience of people such as Father or Quintus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004500_ALPHINAUD……お父様も、軍団長たちも、多くの大人も、
私たちより多くを見聞きしてきているはずだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Perhaps they've come to see the world as a series of problems, and the most efficient way of solving them to reduce everything to fundamental forms.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004510_ALPHINAUDこの世には問題があふれているから、
効率よくそれらをさばけるように、
段々と、物事の形を整理してしまうんじゃないかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004520_ALPHINAUD<tab>A stone is a stone, a cloud a cloud, a flower no more than that. Simple descriptions that strip the subject of distinguishing characteristics.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004520_ALPHINAUD風は風、雪は雪、光は光……
本当は時々で違った顔を持っていることを、
きっと、気にしなくなっていくんだと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004530_ALPHINAUD<tab>A man is a man. Divided according to race, creed, or allegiance─and to some, defined by such associations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004530_ALPHINAUD人も「人とはこういうものだ」と整理される。
だから、割り切ったり諦めたりしやすいのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004540_ALISAIE<tab>Is that what <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> think?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004540_ALISAIE<tab>……そうなの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004550_ALPHINAUD<tab>In my misbegotten youth. But what I believed wisdom was no more than aggressive ignorance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004550_ALPHINAUD昔の私がそうだったんだ。
もちろんそれは、たくさんのことを知ったからじゃなく、
「知った気になったから」だったけれどね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004560_ALPHINAUD<tab>I've since learned to look beyond the banners and the politics. To see people as individuals with their own hopes and dreams.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004560_ALPHINAUD今は世界を作るひとつひとつのこと、
その時々の顔に、目を向けられるようになってきたと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004570_ALPHINAUD<tab>As for my dream of building a better world... Well, every day I am reminded that it is far more complex than I had ever imagined.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004570_ALPHINAUDそうしたら、かつて掲げた「世界の救済」が、
前よりずっと複雑で難しいものになって……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004580_ALPHINAUD<tab>But it only spurs me onward. To find the wisdom and the strength to see it through to the very end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004580_ALPHINAUD<tab>でも、前よりずっと、成し遂げたいと思えるようになったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004590_LUCIA<tab>All of our supplies and an immediate withdrawal? These are your conditions?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004590_LUCIAつまり、物資をすべて置いて、領外へと撤退すること……
それが貴公らの要求だな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004600_JULLUS<tab>Demands. And you forgot about the airship.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004600_JULLUSそうだ。
撤退のときには、飛空艇をひとつ置いていけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004610_JULLUS<tab>Once again, you will leave one behind. It will be used to return the prisoners. Their collars will be removed prior to the exchange.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004610_JULLUSお前たちが去ったことを確認したら、
アルフィノとアリゼーの首輪を外して、それに乗せる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004620_ALISAIE<tab>So in the end, not even Father's expertly worded rhetoric could deter you from your chosen course.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004620_ALISAIEそっか……私もアルフィノも戦いたいのね。
だからお父様の正論にも、素直に頷けなかったんだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Huh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004630_ALPHINAUD<tab>えっ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004640_ALISAIE<tab>Not that I thought for a moment that it would. I've no love for violence, of course, but ours is a cause worth fighting for. I just wish he'd realize it too.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004640_ALISAIEもちろん、理不尽な暴力とか、
誰かを虐げるための武力には賛成しないわよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004650_ALISAIE<tab>Sometimes the only way to protect the ones you love is to take a stand. To refuse to suffer in silence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004650_ALISAIEでも、私たちは、
本当に大切なもののために命を懸けた人たちを……
彼らの戦いを、愚かだったなんて思ってない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004660_ALISAIE<tab>I want you to know I share your conviction. Whether it be on the battlefield or in the debating chamber, I won't back down. I guess what I'm saying is...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004660_ALISAIEそして自分も、叶えたい未来のために戦いたがってる。
これは必ずしも剣や魔法を振るうってことじゃなくて……
ええと……そうね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004670_ALPHINAUD<tab>You've found your own reason to fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004670_ALPHINAUD<tab>かけがえのないものを、大切にして生きること……かな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004680_ALISAIE<tab>Yes. Yes, I have.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004680_ALISAIE<tab>……ええ、きっとそうだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004690_ALISAIE<tab>Gods willing, there will come a day when we can finally lay down our arms, and there will be peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004690_ALISAIEアルフィノが世界を良くしたいって想いとともに生きるなら、
武器を置いたり、置いてもらえるように努力すると思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004700_ALISAIE<tab>But not until the Telophoroi have been defeated once and for all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004700_ALISAIEけど、今テロフォロイを追っているみたいに、
力を手に、血を流しながら進むこともあるはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004710_ALISAIE<tab>And you, Brother, will have a vital part to play. By your words and deeds, you'll lead the way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004710_ALISAIE<tab>どっちも間違いなく、アルフィノの戦いだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004720_ALPHINAUD<tab>...I pray I am up to the task.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004720_ALPHINAUD<tab>……戦い抜けるだろうか、私に。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004730_ALISAIE<tab>There'll always be naysayers. Those who think us fools for even trying.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004730_ALISAIEできないとか、愚かだとか、意味がないとか、
たくさん否定されるでしょうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004740_ALISAIE<tab>It's easy for learned elites to criticize earnest efforts and assert their moral superiority. All without offering alternatives.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004740_ALISAIEそういう言葉って強くて、
誰かが出した答えに「違う」って言った人の方が、
真理に近く見えちゃうものよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004750_ALISAIE<tab>Not that their sophistry has ever wounded you. So stubborn and strong─stronger than you even know.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004750_ALISAIEなのに掲げたものを肯定し続けてきた兄のこと、
私は、強いなって思ってたわよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004760_ALISAIE<tab>Don't ever change, you hear me? If you stumble, I'll be there to catch you. Or give you a thick ear. Maybe both for good measure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004760_ALISAIEだから貫けばいいんじゃない？
また変な方にズレはじめたら、
今度は私が、ブン殴って目を覚まさせてあげるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you, Alisaie...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004770_ALPHINAUD<tab>……ありがとう、アリゼー。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004780_MAXIMA<tab>The scouts have secured Alisaie and Alphinaud. Their collars were removed without complication as well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004780_MAXIMA偵察隊が、アルフィノ殿とアリゼー殿を保護しました。
首輪の解除にも無事成功したそうです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004790_MAXIMA<tab>They report no casualties─not for their party nor the guards, who will wake from their premature slumber in due course.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004790_MAXIMAこれにともなう死傷者はなし。
見張りも、全員眠らせただけですみました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004800_LUCIA<tab>It would appear the situation has changed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004800_LUCIA……聞いたとおりだ。
貴公らと我々は、これでまた対等にテーブルにつける。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004810_LUCIA<tab>I propose new terms. We have information that will be of great interest to Lord Quintus, and I wish to speak with him in person.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004810_LUCIAその上で、改めて相談したいことがあるのだ。
我々のもとに届いた、ある情報について、
クイントゥス殿も交えて話がしたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004820_JULLUS<tab>No. In the event you rejected our first proposal, we came prepared with a second.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004820_JULLUS……それは不可能だ。
交渉が失敗した場合についても、すでに指示は受けている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004830_LUCIA<tab>Ambush!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004830_LUCIA<tab>強襲……ッ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004840_CIRINA<tab>More are coming! Make ready!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004840_CIRINA<tab>こちらからも、来ます！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004850_JULLUS<tab>We, the loyal soldiers of the Ist Legion, proud servants of Garlemald...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004850_JULLUS我ら、ガレマール帝国軍第I軍団……
祖国の頂を護る者……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004860_JULLUS<tab>Of the fallen Emperor Varis, shall safeguard these lands...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004860_JULLUS<tab>皇帝陛下亡き今も、この地は尊き帝都なれば……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004870_JULLUS<tab>...from the barbarian hordes until our countrymen return!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004870_JULLUS<tab>同胞戻り来るまで、身命尽きようとも、蛮族を排せよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004880_LUCIA<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004880_LUCIA<tab>クッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004890_ARUHNSENNA<tab>Stop, both of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004890_ARUHNSENNA<tab>双方、待て……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004900_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004900_JULLUS<tab>ッ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004910_ARUHNSENNA<tab>This child may be the worst emissary I have ever seen...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004910_ARUHNSENNA<tab>話を聞けって言ってるんだ……馬鹿……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004920_LUCIA<tab>We received an urgent communication from the Grand Company of Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004920_LUCIA先ほど、グランドカンパニー・エオルゼアより、
緊急の連絡が入った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004930_LUCIA<tab>Envoys from the imperial army, led by members of the Xth Legion, came to Ala Mhigo and requested an audience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004930_LUCIAアラミゴに、第X軍団を中核とする一団が来訪。
会談を希望してきたそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004940_LUCIA<tab>They explained that their efforts to coordinate the reclamation of the capital with the aid of the IVth, Vth, VIIIth, and XIIth had ended in failure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004940_LUCIA曰く、彼らは帝都解放を目指して共闘を呼びかけるも、
第IV、第V、第VIII、第XII軍団とは交渉決裂……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004950_LUCIA<tab>Communication between most legions has broken down entirely. Most of the Xth's conscripts have deserted, leaving their forces severely depleted.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004950_LUCIA大半の軍団が独自路線を突き進み、交信すらままならぬ中で、
第X軍団自体が属州兵の大量離反を許し、
事実上、継戦能力を喪失……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004960_LUCIA<tab>That is why, unable to continue the fight on their own, they and their allies turned to the Grand Company of Eorzea for aid.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004960_LUCIA以て、グランドカンパニー・エオルゼアに、
保護を申し入れてきたという。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004970_JULLUS<tab>Lies! Every word!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004970_JULLUS<tab>嘘だ、騙されるものか……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004980_LUCIA<tab>It is the truth, and I have not finished. The Xth has requested that we deliver a message to Lord Quintus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004980_LUCIAいいや、事実なのだ、ユルス殿。
第X軍団長から、第I軍団長に宛てた伝言も預かっている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004990_LUCIA<tab>“Have the iyl stand down.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004990_LUCIA<tab>『イルは立たず』と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005000_JULLUS<tab>You have been listening, my lord?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005000_JULLUS<tab>……聞こえてましたか、クイントゥス様。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005010_JULLUS<tab>Wh-What are your orders?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005010_JULLUS<tab>俺たちは……どうすれば…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005020_QUINTUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005020_QUINTUS<tab>……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005030_QUINTUS<tab>Inform her...that we will honor the Xth's decision.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005030_QUINTUS第X軍団の判断に従う。
……そう伝えよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005040_QUINTUS<tab>Bereft of hope...and now dignity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005040_QUINTUS<tab>まこと、この世は、絶望ばかりがすり寄ってきよる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005050_QUINTUS<tab>I release you from your duty. All of you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005050_QUINTUS生きたくば生きよ。
皆にも、そう伝えるがよい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005060_QUINTUS<tab>I take solace, Your Radiance, in the knowledge you are not here to witness our debasement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005060_QUINTUS<tab>……ヴァリス陛下、あなたもさぞ口惜しいでしょうな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005070_QUINTUS<tab>'Twas a grand, glorious dream we shared.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005070_QUINTUSともに国父のもとで駆け、
辺境で身を縮めていた我らが覇者となる夢を見た。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005080_QUINTUS<tab>Of a world united. Of peace and prosperity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005080_QUINTUS<tab>民のため、ただただ強い帝国であらんとした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005090_QUINTUS<tab>We are ghosts, you and I. Memories of days gone by.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005090_QUINTUS<tab>しかし……我らはもはや、亡霊らしい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005100_QUINTUS<tab>Bonds forged in blood...that I will not see tarnished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005100_QUINTUS<tab>赤き鎖は、縛るや、繋ぐや……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005110_ALISAIE<tab>Quickly! We have to reach the station before it's too late!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005110_ALISAIEほら、早く！
テルティウム駅に行かないと！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005120_ALPHINAUD<tab>If there is still a chance that Quintus will agree to a truce, we must take it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005120_ALPHINAUDクイントゥス殿から話が聞けたら、
少しでも彼らの不安が取り除けるよう、
盟主たちにもかけあってみようと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005130_ALISAIE<tab>I just hope we get there before he and his men do something rash...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005130_ALISAIEまずは、ちゃんと伝えられるといいわね。
私たちは違うものだけど、違うから話したいんだって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005140_ALISAIE<tab>Is that all of them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005140_ALISAIE<tab>あら、もしかしてそろそろ最後？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005150_ALPHINAUD<tab>The last of those who agreed to join us, yes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005150_ALPHINAUDああ、こちらに来ることを希望している人は、
現状これで全員だよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005160_THANCRED<tab>We left heaters and provisions for those who wished to stay behind. They won't last forever, but hopefully they'll last long enough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005160_THANCRED駅の方にもストーブと食料は置いてきた。
あれでしばらく持つだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005170_ALISAIE<tab>For now, I think everyone's earned a rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005170_ALISAIE<tab>了解、みんなおつかれさま。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005180_ALISAIE<tab>We'll see to those in need of medical attention, so take the others with you and get yourselves some hot soup.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005180_ALISAIEじゃあ、手当てが必要な人はこっちへ。
大丈夫そうな人は奥に進んで。
炊き出し、やってるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005190_JULLUS<tab>Warmth, at last...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005190_JULLUS<tab>あったかい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005200_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Marvelous, isn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005200_EMMANELLAIN<tab>おおっ、そうだろそうだろ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005210_EMMANELLAIN<tab>All thanks to the resourceful machinists of Ishgard, I might add. On their behalf, I bid you warm yourself to your heart's content!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005210_EMMANELLAINなんてったって、うちの機工士たちが作ったんだ。
思う存分、あったまっていけよな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005220_SICARD<tab>Hold on. Your people might've scribbled a few things on a piece of parchment, but it was our Lominsan smiths that put the bloody things together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005220_SICARDちょっと待て。
確かにイシュガルドで使われてるやつの図案はもらった。
だが、作ったのはうちの職人連中だっただろうが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005230_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Well, be that as it may...we single-handedly got the interior heating up and running again, didn't we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005230_EMMANELLAIN細かい奴……。
まあいいけどな、うちは室内もぽっかぽかにしましたし？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005240_SICARD<tab>The hells you did! We were there every step of the way!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005240_SICARDアァ……？
それも手ェ貸しただろうが。
頭までぽかぽかか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005250_EMMANELLAIN<tab>“We”!? You barely raised a finger to help, you ale-sodden reprobate!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005250_EMMANELLAINなんだよ偉そうに！
っていうか、お前が作ったわけじゃないだろ海賊！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005260_SICARD<tab>I did a damn sight more than you, you lily-livered bilge rat!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005260_SICARD<tab>その言葉、そっくりそのまま返してやるよボンクラ貴族！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005270_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Take that back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005270_EMMANELLAIN<tab>なにをー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005280_SICARD<tab>Make me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005280_SICARD<tab>やるかぁ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005290_EMMANELLAIN<tab>I will not stoop to your level!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005290_EMMANELLAIN<tab>負けるからやりませーん

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005300_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>Here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005300_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>……おい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005310_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>At ease, man. There's nothing funny in it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005310_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION……ん。
お前も食え、悪いものは入ってない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005320_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>I'm from Ala Mhigo, but was a conscript until recently. Used to eat this with the officers.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005320_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION俺はアラミゴから来たが、つい最近まで「帝国兵」だった。
ガレアンの上官と、いつも同じメシを食ってた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005330_ULDAHNDELEGATION<tab>Apparently, it's adapted from a Steppe recipe. This is my first time trying it, and I have to say it's not half bad.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005330_ULDAHNDELEGATIONアジムステップ風の、温まるスープらしいよ。
あたしも初めて食ったけど、案外うまいね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005340_GRIDANIANDELEGATION<tab>Hmm... It's a bit too flavorful for my liking...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005340_GRIDANIANDELEGATION<tab>少し、味が濃すぎる気もするがな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005350_ULDAHNDELEGATION<tab>Perhaps compared to what you're used to.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005350_ULDAHNDELEGATION<tab>あー、あんたのとこと比べると……ね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005360_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>It's the little things that make life worth living, don't you think?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005360_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>……生きててよかったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005370_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005370_JULLUS<tab>う…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005380_LUCIA<tab>I know this is not a dream, and yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005380_LUCIA<tab>この光景を眺めていると、夢の中にいるような気がしてくる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005390_LUCIA<tab>I felt the same way at the Dragonsong War's end. Every morning I would step outside and need to be reminded that it wasn't my imagination. That my world had been forever changed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005390_LUCIA竜詩戦争が終結したときも、こんな心地だった。
朝、目が覚めるたび、どこまでが事実だったのか……と、
わからなくなったものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005400_LUCIA<tab>And just as I had I grown accustomed to the idea, again you change my world in ways I never thought possible.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005400_LUCIAやっと最近慣れてきたのだがな……。
貴公らときたら、待ったなしで次の驚きを引き連れてくる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005410_LUCIA<tab>Were it not for you and your fellow Scions, the rifts between man and dragon and myriad tribes might never have been bridged.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005410_LUCIA本当に……貴公と「暁の血盟」がいなければ、
人と竜、あらゆる種族は引き裂かれたままだっただろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005420_LUCIA<tab>The Grand Company of Eorzea, the Ilsabard contingent... We owe it all to you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005420_LUCIAグランドカンパニー・エオルゼアが結成されることも、
この派遣団が提案されることもなかったはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005430_LUCIA<tab>We've shed many tears in recent days. Of pain and sorrow. Triumph and joy. I much prefer the latter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005430_LUCIA次は私たちが……
彼の涙を後悔に変えぬよう、尽力したいと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>As do I.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>よろしく頼む

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We often don't have the luxury of choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>簡単なことじゃない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005440_LUCIA<tab>I am honored to fight by your side. As an Eorzean and Garlean both, I shall do all in my power to bring my peoples together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005440_LUCIAああ……。
派遣団に加わった、エオルゼアの一員として……
ガレアンの血を受けたものとしても、誓おう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005450_LUCIA<tab>Indeed. We can but do our utmost to unite these disparate peoples and lead them to victory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005450_LUCIAああ、承知しているとも。
各国の要人に報告するのは私の役目……
良い方向に進むよう、全力であたろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005460_MAXIMA<tab>It is a remarkable achievement─everything that I and the Populares had hoped for and more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005460_MAXIMA……本当に、奇跡のようですね。
私たち民衆派が、ついぞ届かなかったものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005470_LUCIA<tab>Would that it had come sooner.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005470_LUCIA<tab>無念に思うか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005480_MAXIMA<tab>Indeed. Too many are not here to see it. And yet...there is a warmth in my breast. As if they still share in this moment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005480_MAXIMA道半ばで散った者が思い出されて、寂しくはあります。
……ですが、なぜかあたたかい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005490_LUCIA<tab>Yes. I know what you mean.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005490_LUCIA<tab>そうか……そうだな、私にも覚えがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005500_LUCIA<tab>On a night like tonight, the wind and cold seem to pass me by.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005500_LUCIA<tab>どれほど寒くとも、不思議と凍えない夜があるものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005510_VARIS<tab>(-Radio-)We...have gained the power...take back...rightfully ours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005510_VARIS(-ラジオが拾った声-)我こそ……ガレマール……皇帝……
ヴァリス……ガル……ス……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005520_JULLUS<tab>What? Emperor Varis?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005520_JULLUS<tab>皇帝、陛下……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005530_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005530_JULLUS<tab>ウッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005540_URIANGER<tab>They are being tempered! The talismans─quickly!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005540_URIANGERエーテル放射です！
いけません、すぐに彼らの保護を……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005550_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005550_JULLUS<tab>うう……ああ……うああッ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005560_FANDANIEL<tab>(-???-)Save me, brave hero!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005560_FANDANIEL<tab>(-？？？？-)お待ちください、英雄殿ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005570_AMON<tab>Ahem! My lord has requested your presence, and I would hate to disappoint him...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005570_AMONなーんて。
あなたはどうぞこちらへ、殿下がお待ちです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005580_AMON<tab>The experiment was a success, but I fear our time is short.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005580_AMON(-？？？？-)ええ……実験……成功していますが……
時間は……ないかと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005590_AMON<tab>I shall begin the preparations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005590_AMON<tab>(-？？？？-)すぐに支度を…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005600_AMON<tab>Now...it is time for you to awaken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005600_AMON<tab>ほら、そろそろお目覚めになってくださいな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005610_AMON<tab>Good morrow to you. Here─have a taste before it gets cold.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005610_AMONおはようございます。
こちら、冷めないうちにどうぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005620_AMON<tab>Oh, but be sure to remove your helmet. Take a moment, too, to familiarize yourself with that borrowed flesh.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005620_AMONああ、兜を外すときは気をつけて。
まだ「その身体」に慣れていないでしょうから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005630_AMON<tab>So? How does it feel? I, for one, find those first moments within a new body to be most refreshing!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005630_AMONいかがです？
魂を別の身体に移し替えられた気分は。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005640_AMON<tab>We had a magitek engineer by the name of Aulus to thank for this method of soul extraction and implantation. I believe the two of you met briefly in Ala Mhigo?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005640_AMONほら、あなたたちにアラミゴで倒された、
アウルスとかいう魔導技師がいたじゃないですか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005650_AMON<tab>His was a rather sticky end, wasn't it? Thankfully, he was thoughtful enough to leave behind his mindjack technology. I took the liberty of making some improvements─and selecting you as my esteemed test subject.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005650_AMON彼の遺したブレインジャックなる技術が、
なかなか面白かったので、改良して使ってみたんですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Give me back my body!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分の身体を返せ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>This is <var 1A 02 /var>such<var 1A 01 /var> a pain in the arse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>最悪だ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005660_AMON<tab>And permit you to go on a righteous rampage instead of partaking in this delicious meal? I think not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005660_AMONええー？
そしたら殺し合いになってしまって、
おちおちディナーも愉しめないじゃないですか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005670_AMON<tab>Come now, to us Ascians, it is no different from trying on new clothes. Why not make the most of it by partaking in this fine cuisine?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005670_AMONおや、アシエン的には、日常茶飯事なのですがね。
あなたも深く考えず、ディナーを愉しむといいですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005680_AMON<tab>I must say, I have gone to great lengths to reunite you with my lord.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005680_AMONいやぁ、私なりに気を遣ったと申しますか……
あなたは殿下の「友」でしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005690_AMON<tab>When I discovered that his “friend” was in this neck of the woods, I suggested inviting you over for dinner.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005690_AMONだったら、せっかく近所まで来ていることですし、
友らしく食事に誘ってはどうかと提案したのですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005700_AMON<tab>He never deigned to respond, but I took his silence as a resounding yes!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005700_AMONそしたら……返事がなかったもので！
「是非に」と解釈いたしましたッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005710_AMON<tab>Oh my! Daddy is pleased his grumpy little boy has finally found his playmate!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005710_AMONおやまぁ……。
不愛想な息子が友人を連れてきて、
お父上も、感無量のご様子だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005720_AMON<tab>Ah. Exposition is in order.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005720_AMON<tab>なに、難しいことじゃないですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005730_AMON<tab>The Garlean Empire has long outlawed all forms of religion. No gods to worship, no risk of summoning. Brilliantly simple.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005730_AMONガレマール帝国では、一切の信仰が禁じられている。
ゆえに、神降ろしに足る強大な存在を、
思い描けないとされてきました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005740_AMON<tab>But people, being people, must turn to something or someone in their hour of need. Who, then?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005740_AMONでも、あると思いませんか？
彼らが畏れ、敬い、すがるもの……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005750_AMON<tab>Why, His Radiance the Emperor, of course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005750_AMON<tab>そう、自身の国家、その象徴たる「皇帝」です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005760_AMON<tab>As you have observed firsthand, Garlemald has seen better days. The legendary Solus zos Galvus─dead. Provinces near and far─in open rebellion. Our bold new Emperor─assassinated! And that last one even sparked a civil war! What rotten luck.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005760_AMON昨今、帝国には悪い風が吹きどおし。
伝説の初代皇帝が身罷られ、属州では独立運動が盛んになり、
新たな皇帝が殺されたのを機に内戦まで起こりだした……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005770_AMON<tab>The people cried out for salvation, their earnest pleas─one might even call them prayers─a supplication united for the Empire to reclaim her former glory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005770_AMONとなれば、民草は願うでしょう。
強く、揺るぎない、ガレマール皇帝が立つことを。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005780_AMON<tab>And so their will did manifest, channeled through the corpse of none other than Emperor Varis himself!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005780_AMONその切なる願いを、
ヴァリス殿下の身体に降ろしてさしあげたのです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005790_AMON<tab>And lo, the savior was born! The embodiment of the Garlean spirit, their Anima!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005790_AMONそうして顕現せしものは、
まさしくガレマールの「」と呼ぶにふさわしい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005800_AMON<tab>It calls to its subjects, compelling them to take up arms and fight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005800_AMON皇帝とは、民草を服従させるもの。
広域にエーテル放射を行う力は、まさにその顕れです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005810_AMON<tab>And just as the wealth and power gravitate towards the Empire's capital, so too does aether, from every corner of the globe!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005810_AMONそれによって、帝都に富と権力が集まってくる……
という概念も利用して、
各地からエーテルを集積してもらいました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005820_AMON<tab>The towers with which you and your allies have been so preoccupied were created as an extension of Anima itself. An ingenious design...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005820_AMON「終末の塔」と呼んでいただいているものは、
アニマの一部を核として創り上げた、端末なのですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005830_AMON<tab>Would you not agree, my lord?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005830_AMON<tab>ね、殿下……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005840_ZENOS<tab>Does the pursuit of prey you have bested before excite you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005840_ZENOS<tab>お前は、すでに狩ったことのある獲物に興味があるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005850_ZENOS<tab>Of course not. Absent the challenge, the thrill, your prize is a hollow victory. Butchery.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005850_ZENOS……ないだろう。
精々、毛皮や肉ほしさに、淡々と屠るだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005860_ZENOS<tab>Perhaps you think that to be the extent of my promise. I have no doubt fallen in your estimation since Ala Mhigo.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005860_ZENOS俺に対しても同じこと。
あの庭園で勝敗を決したときから、
取るに足らぬものと感じているのだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005870_ZENOS<tab>Fair enough. But do not let your disdain deprive you─deprive us─of an opportunity to craft an even more majestic moment of euphoria.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005870_ZENOSそれは構わぬ。
しかし、お前に気がなければ、
前回を超える一戦など、到底果たせまい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005880_ZENOS<tab>I have been honing my craft as I set the stage for our reunion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005880_ZENOS俺は牙を研ぐと同時に、
再びお前を「その気」にさせる必要があったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005890_ZENOS<tab>Wheresoever there is suffering and despair, you appear, to fulfill your duty as defender of this star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005890_ZENOS英雄……。
それは、絶望と悲嘆が渦巻く場所に現れ、
命を賭して戦う者だという。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005900_ZENOS<tab>The chaos and destruction that my hordes have wrought...are my gifts to you alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005900_ZENOS<tab>ゆえにあれこれと壊してみたのだが……どうだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005910_ZENOS<tab>At a loss for words? No matter. As you will learn, I have only just begun.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005910_ZENOSまあ、今はいい。
こちらもまだ、すべての薪をくべてはいないからな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005920_AMON<tab>Oh? Will you not finish your meal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005920_AMON<tab>おや、お食事はもう終わりですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005930_ZENOS<tab>There is only one thing that can sate my hunger, and it would seem my friend has lost <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> appetite.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005930_ZENOS我が友を前にしては、何を食っても餓えるばかりよ。
加えてそちらも、食欲はないようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005940_ZENOS<tab>I hoped this display of civility might prove an entertaining diversion, but clearly we are above such pretensions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005940_ZENOS友らしき行いとやらを一度は試すかとつきあったが……
やはり、お前と俺はこうではないらしい。
退屈な晩餐に招いた詫びをしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005950_ZENOS<tab>While my lifeless body was in the possession of the Ascian, I too claimed another's as my own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005950_ZENOS俺は以前、アシエンからこの身体を取り戻すまで、
別人の肉体を使っていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005960_ZENOS<tab>It was an enlightening experience, to fight in an unfamiliar form. Flaws and failings in my technique were plain to see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005960_ZENOSなかなかに学ぶことも多かったぞ。
異なる体躯で戦うからこそ、己が癖も見えてくる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005970_ZENOS<tab>Whence rises one's true strength? The flesh? The soul? Perhaps you should like to discover the answer for yourself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005970_ZENOS強さというものは、魂に宿るのか、肉体に宿るのか……
それを問う機会を、お前にも贈ろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005980_ZENOS<tab>Or...together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005980_ZENOS<tab>さあ、取り戻しにくるがいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005990_AMON<tab>Oh dear! Whatever would happen if my lord were to greet your friends as you? I shudder to imagine what carnage he would wreak!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005990_AMONああ、大変……っ！
あれがあなたのフリをしてキャンプに戻ったら、
どんな大惨事が起きてしまうのでしょうか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006000_AMON<tab>We'd better hurry if we want to avert the bloodbath. You can thank me later for my generosity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006000_AMONええ、ええ、血みどろの光景を見たくなければ、
急いで追ったほうがよろしいかと。
私がお送りいたしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006010_AMON<tab>Ah, there it is. Your camp, I believe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006010_AMONさて……。
派遣団のキャンプは、あちらですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006020_AMON<tab>If I were to hazard a guess, I would say that you─the other you─is making <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> way there as we speak.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006020_AMONあなたの姿をした殿下も、あそこを目指しているはず。
追いかけて止めないと、何をしでかすやら……なのですが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006030_AMON<tab>Alas, this you will have to walk from here. Or run, if you can manage it. My lord would be cross if I made it too easy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006030_AMONはい、ここからは徒歩でお願いしますね。
でないと、殿下のご意向に沿えませんし？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006040_AMON<tab>Such ingratitude. I'd not squander this fighting chance. After all, you've obstacles enough to overcome─right on cue!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006040_AMON残念、私なんかを相手にしてる時間はありませんよ。
あなたの行く手には障害がたくさんあるんです。
例えば……ほら！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006050_AMON<tab>Tempered soldiers, with standing orders to kill those not sworn to Anima.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006050_AMONテンパードになっている兵士です。
彼らには、あなたのようにアニマに与しない者を……
つまり無事な生存者を駆逐せよと命令してあります。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006060_AMON<tab>Under normal circumstances you would make short work of them. But on this occasion, the odds are not so heavily stacked in your favor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006060_AMONいつもの身体なら相手にもならないでしょうが……さて。
お仲間たちを助けるために、精々がんばってくださいね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006070_YSHTOLA<tab>It is a miracle we were able to restrain the tempered without suffering casualties.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006070_YSHTOLAそれじゃあ、精神汚染を受けた人は、
これで全員保護できたのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006080_LUCIA<tab>A welcome one. A-Ruhn-Senna and the others have their hands full as it is. Thankfully, there are enough scales for everyone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006080_LUCIAああ、すでにア・ルン・センナ殿が中心となって、
治療もはじまっている。
治せた者から、予備の霊鱗も渡していくそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006090_ALPHINAUD<tab>And what of Jullus? His symptoms were particularly severe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006090_ALPHINAUD<tab>ユルスは……彼のテンパード化も解けるでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006100_LUCIA<tab>They were, but others fared still worse, including some brought back from the Magna Glacies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006100_LUCIAそうだな……。
マグナ・グラキエスで保護した者も合わせると、
かなりの数のテンパードを抱えている状態になる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006110_LUCIA<tab>As those in most desperate need take priority, it may be a while before he receives treatment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006110_LUCIA治療は弱っているものから優先的にと聞いているから、
彼の番がくるまで、まだ時間がかかるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006120_LUCIA<tab>But rest assured that he will. In the meantime, we must find our missing friend. May the Fury guide you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006120_LUCIAだが、必ずやりとげよう。
貴公らはとにかく、かの者の捜索に専念してくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006130_ESTINIEN<tab>Of all the bloody times for a disappearing act...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006130_ESTINIEN<tab>まったく、相棒はどこに行ったんだ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006140_THANCRED<tab>Right when the first wave struck. We'd be fools to think it a coincidence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006140_THANCRED恐らく、一度目のエーテル放射の直後に、
何らかの理由でここを出たんだろうが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006150_THANCRED<tab>But where even to begin the search? No one saw <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> leave in the chaos, and we've no trail to follow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006150_THANCREDあのときは、キャンプ中が酷く混乱してたからな。
めぼしい手掛かりはなしだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006160_ALPHINAUD<tab>While I know full well <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> can handle <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>, I worry all the same.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006160_ALPHINAUD大抵のことはどうにかできてしまう人だけれど……
心配だね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006170_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah. Speak of the devil...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006170_GRAHATIA<tab>あれって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006180_ALISAIE<tab>Well! Time to call off the search!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006180_ALISAIE<tab>なんだ、帰ってきたじゃない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006190_THANCRED<tab>Hmph. Case closed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006190_THANCRED<tab>一件落着だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006200_YSHTOLA<tab>That's <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>? Over there?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006200_YSHTOLA<tab>あの人が、そこにいるの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006210_URIANGER<tab>Aye, 'twould appear so. Thou art struggling to perceive <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> presence?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006210_URIANGERええ、そのようですが……。
もしや、うまく視えませんか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006220_YSHTOLA<tab>I am. Perhaps, in the aftermath of the wave, there is some residual effect interfering with my faculties, but...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006220_YSHTOLAそうね、先のエーテル放射の影響で、
確かに視界の調子は悪いのだけれど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006230_ALISAIE<tab>Where have you been? We've been worried sick!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006230_ALISAIEおかえりなさい！
急にいなくなって、みんな心配してたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006240_GRAHATIA<tab>Now, now, all's well that ends well. Are you all right?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006240_GRAHATIAとりあえず、無事でよかった。
何かあったのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006250_ALISAIE<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Are<var 1A 01 /var> you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006250_ALISAIE<tab>どうしたの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006260_GRAHATIA<tab>...Who are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006260_GRAHATIA<tab>…………あんた、誰だ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Enough, Zenos!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>そこまでだ、ゼノス！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Get away from them, you bastard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ふたりから離れろ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006270_AMON<tab>Sadly, that is all we have time for today. The effect has run its course, and back to your own bodies you must go.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006270_AMONはい、残念ながらブレインジャックは効果切れ、
それぞれの身体に戻るお時間です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006280_AMON<tab>But where are my manners? You have all traveled so very far, and I have yet to pay my respects.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006280_AMONどうもこんにちは。
遠路はるばる来ていただいたのに、
ご挨拶が遅くなって申し訳ありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006290_AMON<tab>Though in my defense, I was ill prepared to receive so many uninvited guests. As such, preliminary entertainments were in order.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006290_AMONなにせ時間稼ぎをしたかったもので。
多勢に無勢のこの状況で、どうしたものかと悩んだんですよ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006300_AMON<tab>A handful of tempered soldiers to hamper your progress. Refugees to command your attention while I siphoned their ceruleum from the shadows─particularly effective, that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006300_AMONとりあえずテンパードの兵士たちを配備して……
それから、見逃しておいたたちの巣から、
青燐水を少々盗んでみたりして。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006310_AMON<tab>Charitable souls that you are, you bent over backwards to aid them, heedless of the delay. Predictable to a fault! And so my plan approaches completion unhindered.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006310_AMONいやぁ、効果てきめんでしたね！
慈善活動おつかれさまです、
おかげでこちらは間に合いそうですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006320_AMON<tab>Anima will soon have absorbed the requisite amount of aether, and then shall come the spectacle to end all spectacles!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006320_AMONアニマの力で集めたエーテルが、じき必要量に達します。
そうすれば、やっと幕開けとなる……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006330_AMON<tab>The eldest and most powerful of primals will awaken, and all shall bear witness to the Final Days!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006330_AMON<tab>最古で最強の蛮神を使った、終末の災厄がッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006340_ZENOS<tab>The gods themselves will be my meal. Your dear companions my dessert. Upon this world I'll feast, and death shall follow in my wake.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006340_ZENOS強き神を喰らって、お前の仲間も、世界も、
すべてを引き裂こう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006350_ZENOS<tab>All your hate, all your rage, you will render unto me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006350_ZENOS<tab>今度こそ、殺したいほど、俺を憎めよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006360_VRITRA<tab>For upon thy life's reel wind too many threads. Of fate. Power. Weal, enmeshed with woe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006360_VRITRA君は――引き寄せすぎている――
良きものも――悪しきものも――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006370_VRITRA<tab>More terrible still is the attrition wrought upon thy companions, as they are swept up in the storm of thine existence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006370_VRITRAもっとも恐ろしいのは 君を中心に渦巻く熱が
君のそばにいる者を 燃やし尽くしてしまうこと――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006380_VRITRA<tab>Take heart and protect them well. They will be your strength and your salvation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006380_VRITRA進むのなら 護り抜け――
それこそがいつか必ず――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank goodness. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s awake!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006390_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ……目が覚めたんだね……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Is everyone all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>みんな、無事……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>So I'm not dead yet?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分、生きてる……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006400_GRAHATIA<tab>Perfectly fine, yes. I hope the same can be said of you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006400_GRAHATIAああ……みんな大丈夫だ。
あんたがいちばん、無事じゃなかったんだぞ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006410_GRAHATIA<tab>I am pleased to report you are very much alive.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006410_GRAHATIAああ、生きてる。
ちゃんと戻ってきたから、安心してくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006420_ALISAIE<tab>Everything in working order?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006420_ALISAIE<tab>動けそう……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006430_ALISAIE<tab>That's a relief. Oh, and before I forget: thanks for coming to our rescue.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006430_ALISAIEよかった……。
駆けつけてくれて、ありがとね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006440_YSHTOLA<tab>Given recent events, I would be surprised if you weren't feeling a bit poorly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006440_YSHTOLAおかえりなさい。
とんでもない事件に巻き込まれたようね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006450_YSHTOLA<tab>A hearty meal and a long rest would be my recommendation under normal circumstances, but these are anything but. If Fandaniel's boasts are to be believed, we must act quickly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006450_YSHTOLAできればゆっくり休ませてあげたいのだけれど、
ファダニエルの言葉を信じるなら、時間がないみたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006460_YSHTOLA<tab>Once you've blown away the cobwebs, we can discuss preparations for our assault on the Tower of Babil.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006460_YSHTOLA人心地がついたら、話を聞かせてもらえるかしら？
いよいよ「バブイルの塔」に突入するにあたって、ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006470_LYSE<tab>Now or never!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006470_LYSE<tab>乗りこもう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Farewell, Varis. May the gods have mercy on your soul.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006480_ALPHINAUDヴァリス帝……。
今はどうか、ただ、安らかに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Come. The other two await.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006490_ALPHINAUD<tab>……行こう、ゼノスたちはきっと、さらに上だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006500_ALISAIE<tab>This madness ends here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006500_ALISAIE<tab>ゼノス！　ファダニエルッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006510_AMON<tab>Oh hush. This is the best part...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006510_AMON<tab>うるさいですねぇ……今いいとこなんですよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006520_ESTINIEN<tab>Enough!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006520_ESTINIEN<tab>させるかよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006530_ESTINIEN<tab> Report if displayed
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006530_ESTINIEN<tab>チィッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006540_AMON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006540_AMON<tab>ふふ……はは……ふはははは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006550_AMON<tab>O mighty Zodiark, awaken from your slumber and descend!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006550_AMONさあ塔よ、月から引きずり下ろせ！
眠れる「ゾディアーク」をッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006560_URIANGER<tab>Some manner of magical defense!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006560_URIANGER<tab>あれは……何かが阻んでいる……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006570_ALPHINAUD<tab>Krile! But how!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006570_ALPHINAUDクルルさん！？
どうしてここに……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006580_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)The shackles that bind my adversary will not be so easily broken!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006580_HYDAELYN(-ハイデリン-)防衛機構を作動させました……。
そう簡単に……やらせはしません……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006590_AMON<tab>Hydaelyn... Feeble relic of a forgotten age...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006590_AMONチッ、ハイデリンか……！
死にぞこないめ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006600_AMON<tab>Hark! Victory...is mine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006600_AMON<tab>なら、これで……どうだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006610_AMON<tab>No more aether... And I was so close!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006610_AMONエーテル切れ……。
だが、あとひとつなら……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006620_AMON<tab>My lord, a slight change of plans. We shall travel to the moon and break this wretched barrier ourselves!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006620_AMON殿下、おつきあいいただきますよ。
直接月に渡って、封印を破壊します！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006630_ZENOS<tab>Whatever it takes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006630_ZENOS<tab>……好きにするがいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006640_GRAHATIA<tab>What was that!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006640_GRAHATIA<tab>なんだ、爆発……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006650_ZENOS<tab>The final order issued by Anima to the tempered thralls.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006650_ZENOSアニマはテンパードどもに、ある命令を下している。
それが遂行されはじめたのだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006660_ZENOS<tab>“Should the Empire fall, the world must share her fate.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006660_ZENOS皇帝が崩御せしときは、
世のことごとくを巻き込んで殉じよ……と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006670_ZENOS<tab>Of course, Father lacked the conviction to give such a command. The abomination born of his flesh was but a puppet─and I the puppeteer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006670_ZENOS我が父ならば、決して下さぬ命であろうが……
あれは所詮、父の肉に宿ったまがいもの。
扇動するのも容易い。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006680_ALISAIE<tab>You madman! You monster!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006680_ALISAIE<tab>どこまでも……人を何だと思ってるのよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006690_AMON<tab>There's a funny joy in watching your flailing attempts to fight the inevitable. You're all going to die and are powerless to prevent it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006690_AMON何だっていいんですよ。
間もなく皆、死に絶えるんですから！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006700_AMON<tab>We really must be on our way. You're welcome to give chase, provided you are content to leave comrade and tempered alike to die screaming.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006700_AMONでは、さようなら。
追いかけてきてくれてもいいですよ？
憐れなテンパードと、お仲間たちを見捨ててね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006710_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)I have asked too much of this child. Tend to her.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006710_HYDAELYN(-ハイデリン-)ごめんなさい……。
身体を貸してくれたこの子に、無理をさせました……。
どうか手当てをしてあげて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006720_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)The last brand at Mare Lamentorum is yet unbroken. Zodiark remains bound.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006720_HYDAELYN(-ハイデリン-)月には、ゾディアークが封じられている……。
そのうち「嘆きの海」と呼ばれる区画に、
先ほど彼らが破壊していた、封印の要があります。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006730_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)I have shifted the flow of aether and sent the enemy far from their destination.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006730_HYDAELYN(-ハイデリン-)エーテルの流れを操って、
彼らを、その区画から離れた場所へと導きました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006740_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Now, I shall divert it once more. An ally awaits, and I will deliver you unto him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006740_HYDAELYN(-ハイデリン-)そして今は、「嘆きの海」の……
協力者のもとへ流れ着くようにしてあります。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006750_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Seek his aid. Restore the seal. Zodiark must not be set free...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006750_HYDAELYN(-ハイデリン-)その者と合流を……。
封印の要と……ゾディアークを……どうか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006760_THANCRED<tab>The tempered are running wild. Not only those at the tower, but those back at the camp.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006760_THANCREDこっちもまずいな……。
バブイルの塔や市街地にいたテンパードたちだけでなく、
キャンプで保護している奴らまで暴走しはじめたらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006770_THANCRED<tab>The others are doing their best to contain them, but the situation is growing beyond our control.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006770_THANCRED派遣団が必死に抑え込もうとしているようだが、
さすがに苦戦してる様子だ。
すでにかなりの被害が出ているらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006780_ALISAIE<tab>Leave them to die, or give up the chase. Just like Fandaniel said...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006780_ALISAIEファダニエルが言うとおり、
見捨てていくしかないってわけ……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm the one Zenos wants.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ゼノスの狙いは自分だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Only I can bring an end to this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>あいつらと決着をつけてくる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Garlemald's fate is in your hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>ガレマルドのことは任せた……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006790_ALPHINAUD<tab>You're...you're going alone!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006790_ALPHINAUD<tab>君は……まさか、ひとりで……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006800_ALPHINAUD<tab>You have our trust and our faith. I pray we have yours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006800_ALPHINAUD……君を信じる。
君も、私たちを信じてくれるかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our friends and the tempered need our help. We will save as many as we can─I swear!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006810_ALPHINAUDそれなら、必ず救ってみせよう。
派遣団の仲間も、テンパードにされてしまった人も……
ひとりでも多く！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006820_THANCRED<tab>Once we have matters well in hand, we will join you on the moon. Until then, be careful. There's no telling what you'll find.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006820_THANCREDこっちを収められたら、すぐにお前のあとを追う。
言うまでもないが……気をつけろよ。
さすがに月は、未踏の地だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006830_EMETSELCH<tab>Long, long before Dalamud was forged to imprison an elder primal...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006830_EMETSELCH<tab>赤き月ダラガブに神が封じられるより  遥か昔――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006840_EMETSELCH<tab>The eldest of them all─savior of the star─was sealed within a moon of His own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006840_EMETSELCH白き月にもまた
星の意志になるはずだった神が封じられた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006850_EMETSELCH<tab>Souls sacrificed to grant Him life still slumber and dream of the day He and we will be made whole.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006850_EMETSELCH古き人の魂を呑んだその神は 今もなお
完全な形となる日を夢見て眠っている

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006860_EMETSELCH<tab>Here He waits, in this cold, barren place. His cradle and His grave.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006860_EMETSELCHどこまでも荒涼とした光景は
揺り籠というよりも 墓碑のない墓場のようで

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006870_EMETSELCH<tab>Silent lamentations and prayers of hope echo soundlessly to a sundered star, adrift and alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006870_EMETSELCH聞こえるはずもない 嘆きの声と祈りの歌が
青き星に昇っていく気がしたものだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006880_WATCHEROFMOON<tab>(-Distant Echo-)<var 48 F20223 /var>You... With me...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006880_WATCHEROFMOON<tab>(-どこからか響く声-)<var 48 F20223 /var>……者よ……こちらに…………。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006890_WATCHEROFMOON<tab>(-Distant Echo-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Hydaelyn's champion...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006890_WATCHEROFMOON<tab>(-どこからか響く声-)<var 48 F20223 /var>ハイデリンに導かれし者よ…………。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006900_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Apologies. I have been preoccupied for quite some time, and am...out of practice at conversation...<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006900_WATCHEROFMOON来てくれたか。
すまない、意識を術に向けていたうえ、
会話など久方ぶりで……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006910_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Ever since this moon was created by Hydaelyn, I have served as...an integral part. I am the watcher.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006910_WATCHEROFMOON私は「月の監視者」。
ハイデリンによって月とともに創造された、
管理機構の一端だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006920_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I am responsible for the prisoner and the devices that hold Him fast.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006920_WATCHEROFMOON名のとおり、
「あれ」が正しく封印されているかを監視している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006930_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Zodiark Himself. A projection of the moon's core.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006930_WATCHEROFMOONゾディアークだ。
もっとも、あそこに浮いているのは、
月の中枢で眠る姿を投影したものにすぎないが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006940_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Though rent asunder by Hydaelyn, He grows more powerful with every Rejoining. Seven there have been. Seven too many...<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006940_WATCHEROFMOON遥か昔、ハイデリンに分かたれた彼は、
七度の世界統合によって力を取り戻してきた。
しかし見てのとおり、まだ完全ではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006950_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>And yet, for all His servants' machinations, He remains incomplete. The fallen are beyond salvation.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006950_WATCHEROFMOONこの状態では、アシエンたちが望むように、
古き人々を蘇らせることはできないだろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006960_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>No attempt would be made to free Zodiark. Not until He is whole once more.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006960_WATCHEROFMOONゆえにこれまでは、誰ひとりとして、
不完全なゾディアークを引きずり出そうとしなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006970_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But someone has taken action. The shackles that hold Him nearly shattered.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006970_WATCHEROFMOON……だが、今回は事情が違うらしい。
手痛い一撃を食らわせてくれたおかげで、封印が損傷している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006980_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Six locks to his gaol, great and grand.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006980_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>大穴のまわりに、6つの構造物があるのが見えるだろうか？<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006990_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Gargantuan swords driven deep. Brands to bind Zodiark forevermore.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_006990_WATCHEROFMOONあれが封印の要……
その形から、私たちは「剣」と呼んでいる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_007000_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Five were destroyed by his would-be liberator. One of these I have restored.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_007000_WATCHEROFMOONあれらがすべて破壊されたとき、ゾディアークが解き放たれる。
先ほどの攻撃で5つが砕け、うち1つを修復……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_007010_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I strive to mend the remaining four, but my efforts are being impeded...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_007010_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>残り4つの「剣」も、全速力で修復を試みているのだが……。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_007020_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Souls sacrificed to summon Zodiark, their manifestation consequence of the waning seal.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_007020_WATCHEROFMOONゾディアークを構成する、贄となった者の魂。
その思念が、封印が弱ったことで浮かび上がっているのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_007030_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>They labor in opposition to my work. They must be expelled for the preservation of all.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_007030_WATCHEROFMOON彼らが「剣」の修復を阻害している。
どうにか排除してきてはもらえないだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>If keeping Zodiark imprisoned is the right thing to do, I will aid you.
